name: resolder
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to use solder (= a soft metal that is melted) to join back together pieces of metal that have come apart: Repair detached pins by resoldering them with a soldering iron. I re-soldered a broken wire in the handset.
More examplesFewer examplesI was confident that when the circuit was resoldered, the motor would work again.To repair the break, either get a new cable or cut into the cable and re-solder it.I fixed a hole in the petrol tank, put in a new resonator, and had the radiator resoldered.
